definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
A Dream of Red Mansions (first completed edition 1791) by Cao Xueqin 曹雪芹[Cao2 Xue3 qin2], one of the four great novels
to dream/to have a dream/fig. illusion/fantasy/pipe dream
to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night
to fulfill one's dream/(divination) to predict the future by interpreting a dream/oneiromancy
to dream about (sth or sb)/to see in a dream
to sleepwalk/to journey in a dream

sentences.english: Where all is obscure and unrealized the best similitude is a dream.
sentences.chinese: 一切都是模糊而非现实的，酷似一场梦。

sentences.english: Slipper dream compared to the people, Kate has overturned that idea.
sentences.chinese: 相比人们的水晶鞋梦，凯特却颠覆了这种观念。

sentences.english: It is a dream deeply rooted in the American dream.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个深植于美国梦的梦想。

sentences.english: As with the Wal-Mart dream, I know better.
sentences.chinese: 就像谁人沃尔玛的梦那样，我就晓得。

sentences.english: Sleeping at last in a dreamless sleep locked fast.
sentences.chinese: 终于在无梦的睡眠中睡得香。

sentences.english: Dream most level than Cao Xueqin.
sentences.chinese: 梦做的最有水平的要数曹雪芹了。

sentences.english: They were enticed westward by dreams of gold.
sentences.chinese: 他们被黄金梦引诱到西部。

sentences.english: To me, dreams about flying express feelings about freedom;
sentences.chinese: 就我看来，有关飞翔的梦表达了对自由的渴望。

sentences.english: In my dream last night, I learned a new skill.
sentences.chinese: 在我昨晚的梦中，我又学到了一项新技能。

sentences.english: But this was also a year in which the Chinese Dream showed clearly.
sentences.chinese: 而这一年也是中国梦非常明显的一年。

sentences.english: In primitive tribes, dreams were thought to be the indication of God or the haunting of the devil.
sentences.chinese: 在原始部落中，梦被当成天神降临或是妖魔附体。

sentences.english: He calls to me through my dreams.
sentences.chinese: 他在我的梦中向我召唤。

sentences.english: If two people are meant to be together , eventually they ' ll find their wat back.
sentences.chinese: 如果两个人注定在一起，他们总会找到重温旧路的梦。

sentences.english: This is my dream, dream of the belief of realization is.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的梦，是梦境实现的圣域。

sentences.english: Car crash, broken glass, broke my dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 车辆猛撞了，玻璃尽裂，打碎我的梦。

definition: see 黃粱夢|黄粱梦[huang2 liang2 meng4]
lit. a dream of Nanke/fig. dreams of grandeur
